nodes.text: Vonium was a precious metal. Some droids displayed in the Kentas gallery of the droid museum on Nubia were gilded in vonium.

In the Star Wars canon, vonium was first mentioned in the comic book Star Wars Adventures Free Comic Book Day 2019, which was written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, vonium was first mentioned in "Snow Job," an article written by Daniel Kaufman and published in 2000.
